feed.title: Kinto Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 20.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix purge_deleted() method in memory backend by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3520

New Features

  • Ref #3516: Add new index on deleted objects by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3519
  • Add option to disable history for certain users by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3515

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/20.2.0...20.3.0

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 20.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Features

  • Ref #3515: log more about history trim and expose more settings in root URL by @leplatrem in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3522

Dependency Updates

  • Update Kinto Admin version to 3.7.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/pull/3521

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kinto/kinto/compare/20.3.0...20.4.0

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 20.5.0
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Kinto: 20.6.1
